data.title: Speculation Intensifies Around Abhishek Bachchan's Marriage
data.meta_description: Rumors of a possible separation between Bollywood stars Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai have intensified after Abhishek liked an Instagram post about the rising trend of 'grey divorces'. The couple has recently been seen attending events separately, with Aishwarya arriving solo with their daughter at a high-profile wedding, further fueling speculation. The Instagram post, shared by journalist Heena Khandelwal, discusses the challenges and increasing rates of divorces among older couples. Social media has been abuzz with fans speculating on the implications of Abhishek's social media activity, although neither Abhishek nor Aishwarya has publicly addressed the rumors. Screenshots of Abhishek's like have been widely shared, leading to mixed reactions from fans, with some defending it as a general engagement with the content.
data.text:
Rumors of a possible separation between Bollywood stars Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai have intensified after Abhishek liked an Instagram post about the rising trend of 'grey divorces'. The couple has recently been seen attending events separately, with Aishwarya arriving solo with their daughter at a high-profile wedding, further fueling speculation. The Instagram post, shared by journalist Heena Khandelwal, discusses the challenges and increasing rates of divorces among older couples. Social media has been abuzz with fans speculating on the implications of Abhishek's social media activity, although neither Abhishek nor Aishwarya has publicly addressed the rumors. Screenshots of Abhishek's like have been widely shared, leading to mixed reactions from fans, with some defending it as a general engagement with the content.

a3e43

Abhishek and Aishwarya Rai were seen attending a high-profile wedding separately, with Aishwarya arriving solo with their daughter, further fueling rumors of their potential separation.

3

Abhishek Bachchan's social media activity, particularly liking a post on 'grey divorces', has intensified speculation about the state of his marriage with Aishwarya Rai.

4

The term 'grey divorces' refers to couples who get divorced typically after the age of 50, indicating a rising trend of divorce among older couples in long-lasting marriages.
